allchannel.title: MRTV-4
allchannel.vol: MRTV-4 is a 24-hour free-to-air television channel that broadcasts entertainment programs.

allchannel.title: Channel-K
allchannel.vol: Channel K is a 24-hour free-to-air television channel that broadcasts entertainment programs. Launched in February 2019, Channel K is a digital free-to-air entertainment channel headquartered in Yangon

allchannel.title: Channel 7
allchannel.vol: In 2012, Forever Group Co., Ltd launched the second free-to-air channel called Channel 7, targeting to the younger audience of Myanmar.

allchannel.title: Farmer Channel
allchannel.vol: Department of Agricultural Research (DAR), formerly known as Agricultural Research Institute (ARI), is the only one research center of our country, Myanmar, for more than 6 decades now.
